content.question: Neminem magis in senectute aemulari velim (lines 1-2) is translated

choices.label: I will want no old man to be imitated in more things.
No one would want more imitation in their old age.
No one wants to be imitated more in their old age.
I would want to imitate no one in their old age more.

content.answer: I would want to imitate no one in their old age more.

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
